mapper.select:
SELECT PRNO, PRTITLE, PP.USERNO, USERNM, PRSTATUS, DATE_FORMAT(PRDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') PRDATE , PRSTARTDATE, PRENDDATE FROM PRJ_PROJECT PP INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON PP.USERNO=CU.USERNO
ORDER BY PRNO DESC
LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRJ_PROJECT(PRTITLE, USERNO, PRSTATUS, PRDATE, DELETEFLAG, PRSTARTDATE, PRENDDATE) VALUES (#{prtitle}, #{userno}, #{prstatus}, NOW(), 'N', #{prstartdate}, #{prenddate})
mapper.select: SELECT PRNO, PRTITLE, PP.USERNO, USERNM, PRSTATUS, DATE_FORMAT(PRDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') PRDATE , PRSTARTDATE, PRENDDATE FROM PRJ_PROJECT PP INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON PP.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE PP.DELETEFLAG='N' AND PRNO=#{prno}
